title: SoC RTVF 360-0-27 Topics in Media Writing

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This class will provides the opportunity to learn how to television comedy. Students will examine existing shows to parse out what is successful and what is not and then will craft their own half-hour comedy, including series concept, written pitch, outline and first draft. As much time as possible will be spent in a workshop setting, solving problems that arise at each step of the process.

subject: RTVF
